forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: new screens on odd shapes have issues displaying videos

comments.text: i use curved screens and i havent been able to create new ones because videos play ontop of them in wierd positions.
other shapes have the issue too. here is a screen i made awhile ago that works. (rather large)
i also want to point out that that screen shape i uploaded still flips the image on the inside. the mirror option does not fix it.
